data.message:
Thank you sir I would love to talk too you and learn how I can get HELP cleaning up my neighborhood. it is a forgotten part of my city water pipes I've been there since sense the late thirties and forties we need new sewer lines,we have grown up lots and an old houses I need to be torn down.I love nothing and our city for none of our children's, youth or young adult to do are go..I. am also a City Council member here in our city .We don't even have jobs for youth for the summer, nor for our adultscan you please help me bring life to my community and  a youth center and some good jobs to Cleveland, Texas
Thank you for being a Amazing and Awesome President and Bring your beautiful family in to the white house. But most of all Bringing God into the white house your did a great job and the world will see it when your gone. WELL DONE SIR
